page.title: 05Shillington 5
page.content: There is no class or social structure here; it just would not be tolerated. This is a grass roots village of people working in harmony for the goog of all. Although rural, Shillington could not really be described as a farming community. Most people commut to the surrounding towns to work, especially Luton, Dunstable, Hitchin and also London. The Luton car industry once dominated most of the employment in the area. Summer holidays were described as "Vauxhall fortnight." Now, it is not so prominent but still important.
